member.name: ITfTextLayoutSink.OnLayoutChange
member.summary: Receives a notification when the layout of a context view changes.
member.param: Pointer to the interface for the context that changed.
Specifies the element that describes the layout change.
Pointer to the interface for the context view in that the layout change occurred.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ITfTextLayoutSink
member.summary: The ITfTextLayoutSink interface supports the context layout change by an application. Install this advise sink by calling with IID_ITfTextLayoutSink. A text service can optionally implement this interface.
